      • getTemplateFromTopology

        @Nonnull
String getTemplateFromTopology(@Nonnull
                                        alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot archiveRoot)
                                 throws IOException
        Obtain the string TOSCA template representation from the in-memory representation.
        WARNING: Some nodes or properties might be missing!! Use at your own risk!
        Parameters:
        archiveRoot - the ArchiveRoot from which serialize the TOSCA template
        Returns:
        the serialized TOSCA template
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error serializing the template

      • contextualizeImages

        List<ImageData> contextualizeImages(DeploymentProvider deploymentProvider,
                                    alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot parsingResult,
                                    CloudProvider cloudProvider,
                                    String cloudServiceId)
        Replace images data in 'tosca.capabilities.indigo.OperatingSystem' capabilities in the TOSCA template with the provider-specific identifier.
        Parameters:
        deploymentProvider - the deployment provider.
        parsingResult - the in-memory TOSCA template.
        cloudProvider - the chosen cloud provider data.

      • contextualizeImages

        List<ImageData> contextualizeImages(DeploymentProvider deploymentProvider,
                                    alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot parsingResult,
                                    CloudProvider cloudProvider,
                                    String cloudServiceId,
                                    boolean replace)
        Find matches for images data in 'tosca.capabilities.indigo.OperatingSystem' capabilities in the TOSCA template with the provider-specific identifier.
        Parameters:
        deploymentProvider - the deployment provider.
        parsingResult - the in-memory TOSCA template.
        cloudProvider - the chosen cloud provider data.
        replace - whether to actually replace the image IDs or just do a dry-run.

      • validateUserInputs

        void validateUserInputs(Map<String,alien4cloud.model.components.PropertyDefinition> templateInputs,
                        Map<String,Object> inputs)
                 throws ToscaException
        Verifies that all the template's required inputs are present in the user's input list.
        Parameters:
        templateInputs - the templates's defined inputs.
        inputs - the user's input list.
        Throws:
        ToscaException - in case a required input is not present in the user's input or if the user's input value doesn't match the defined input type.

      • replaceInputFunctions

        @Nonnull
void replaceInputFunctions(@Nonnull
                                    alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot archiveRoot,
                                    Map<String,Object> inputs)
                             throws ToscaException
        Replaces TOSCA input functions with the actual input values (user's input values or default ones).
        Parameters:
        archiveRoot - the in-memory TOSCA template.
        inputs - the user's inputs to the template.
        Throws:
        ToscaException - if the input replacement fails TODO.

      • parseTemplate

        @Nonnull
alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot parseTemplate(@Nonnull
                                                           String toscaTemplate)
                                                    throws IOException,
                                                           alien4cloud.tosca.parser.ParsingException,
                                                           ToscaException
        Parse the TOSCA template (string) and get the in-memory representation.
        This also checks for validation errors.
        Parameters:
        toscaTemplate - the TOSCA template as string.
        Returns:
        an ArchiveRoot representing the template.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs (converting the string to a CSAR zipped archive internally).
        alien4cloud.tosca.parser.ParsingException - if parsing errors occur.
        ToscaException - if validation errors occur.

      • parseAndValidateTemplate

        @Nonnull
alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot parseAndValidateTemplate(@Nonnull
                                                                      String toscaTemplate,
                                                                      Map<String,Object> inputs)
                                                               throws IOException,
                                                                      alien4cloud.tosca.parser.ParsingException,
                                                                      ToscaException
        As for parseTemplate(String) but also validates user's inputs.
        Parameters:
        toscaTemplate - the TOSCA template as string.
        Returns:
        an ArchiveRoot representing the template.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs (converting the string to a CSAR zipped archive internally).
        alien4cloud.tosca.parser.ParsingException - if parsing errors occur.
        ToscaException - if validation errors occur.

      • prepareTemplate

        @Nonnull
alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot prepareTemplate(@Nonnull
                                                             String toscaTemplate,
                                                             Map<String,Object> inputs)
                                                      throws IOException,
                                                             alien4cloud.tosca.parser.ParsingException,
                                                             ToscaException
        As for #parseAndValidateTemplate(String) but also replaces the user's inputs.
        Parameters:
        toscaTemplate - the TOSCA template as string.
        Returns:
        an ArchiveRoot representing the template.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs (converting the string to a CSAR zipped archive internally).
        alien4cloud.tosca.parser.ParsingException - if parsing errors occur.
        ToscaException - if validation errors occur.

      • getAssociatedNodesByCapability

        Map<String,alien4cloud.model.topology.NodeTemplate> getAssociatedNodesByCapability(Map<String,alien4cloud.model.topology.NodeTemplate> nodes,
                                                                                   alien4cloud.model.topology.NodeTemplate nodeTemplate,
                                                                                   String capabilityName)
        Finds all the nodes associated to the given NodeTemplate with a capability with the given name.
        Parameters:
        nodes - the template's node map.
        nodeTemplate - the origin node.
        capabilityName - the name of the capability.
        Returns:
        a map with the nodes (and their names) associated to the origin node with given capability.

        Get the list of resources to be removed.
        Parameters:
        nodeTemplate - NodeTemplate
        Returns:
        the list of resources to be removed or an empty list

               throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • extractOneDataRequirements

        Map<String,OneData> extractOneDataRequirements(alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot archiveRoot,
                                               Map<String,Object> inputs)
        Extracts OneData requirements (i.e. space, favorite providers, etc) from the TOSCA template.
        Parameters:
        archiveRoot - an ArchiveRoot representing the template.
        inputs - the user's input list.
        Returns:
        a Map of OneData requirement, index by node name.
        WARNING: (TEMPORARY) currently OneData nodes are not supported; thus the name used are hard-coded and are either 'input', 'output' or 'service'.
